display_long_description:
Get your trigger fingers ready, because Crazy Chicken VR Blast takes the chaotic, chicken-blasting action to a whole new dimension! Dive into the crazy world of the iconic Moorhuhn/Crazy Chicken franchise, now fully reimagined for VR, and experience the ultimate test of speed, accuracy, and just how much fun it is to shoot at zany, unpredictable chickens!



[media]

# Blast Away!

Grab your weapon and try to hit as many chickens as you possibly can.

# Dodge those eggs!

Shoot the eggs for extra points, dodge them or be hit and covered in yolk! 

# Multiple Weapons to unlock

Unlock new weapons by succeeding time trials!

# Variety of iconic levels

Play through recognizable locations that are inspired by past Moorhuhn/Crazy Chicken titles.

# Arcade & Endless

- Arcade Mode: Fast-paced, score-focused, and endlessly addictive.

- Endless Survival: How long can you last as the chickens just keep coming? 

# Interactive Environments

Use the environment to your advantage to increase your score. 

# Power-ups Galore

Instantly reload or gain temporary powerful weapons to turn the tide in your favor!

# Cheats and Costumes

Alter your playthrough with funny cheats and costumes!

# Leaderboards

Prove you’re the top chicken chaser with global high scores!
